org.codehaus.preon.el.util
Class ExpressionBuilder<E>

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.preon.el.util.ExpressionBuilder<E>
Type Parameters:
E - The type of environment used to resolve references.
public class ExpressionBuilder<E>
extends Object

A simple convenience class for building Expression instances, simply encapsulating a ReferenceContext, allowing clients to be unaware of the particular ReferenceContext in use.

Author:
Wilfred Springer

Method Detail

createBoolean

public Expression<Boolean,E> createBoolean(String expr)
                                    throws InvalidExpressionException
Creates an Expression of type boolean.

Parameters:
expr - A character sequence conforming to the el grammar, returning a boolean.
Returns:
A boolean Expression.
Throws:
InvalidExpressionException - If the character sequence passed in is not a valid el expression returning a boolean, or if the references used cannot be linked to the ReferenceContext.

createInteger

public Expression<Integer,E> createInteger(String expr)
                                    throws InvalidExpressionException
Creates an Expression of type integer.

Parameters:
expr - A character sequence conforming to the el grammar, returning an integer.
Returns:
A boolean Expression.
Throws:
InvalidExpressionException - If the character sequence passed in is not a valid el expression returning an integer, or if the references used cannot be linked to the ReferenceContext.
